alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 14 at 12:39PM CST until February 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Blowing Dust Warning, widespread blowing dust. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Carson and Gray Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Severely limited visibilities are expected. Travel will be dangerous and possibly life-threatening.
info.instruction: Persons with respiratory problems should make preparations to stay indoors until the storm passes. Be ready for a sudden drop in visibility to near zero. If you encounter blowing dust or blowing sand on the roadway or see it approaching, pull off the road as far as possible and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights all the way off and keep foot off the brake pedal. Remember, `Pull Aside, Stay Alive`.
